relevant_findings.general: Frail elderly chronically ill female, appears older than stated age. At risk for malnutrition, grooming OK.
relevant_findings.eyes: NC/AT, PERRL, EOMI without nystagmus, no scleral icterus.
relevant_findings.ears_nose_mouth_throat: MMM, no lesions noted in oral cavity.
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, no JVD or carotid bruits appreciated.
relevant_findings.respiratory: Lungs CTA bilaterally without rales, rhonchi, or wheezes.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: RRR, normal S1 S2, loud systolic ejection murmur at the left lower sternal border (LLSB).
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Soft abdomen, diminished bowel sounds, LLQ pain. Small amount of soft stool noted, not impacted, guaiac negative.
relevant_findings.skin: No rashes or lesions noted, no pressure ulcers.
relevant_findings.extremities: 2+ edema bilaterally, 2+ dorsalis pedis and posterior tibial pulses bilaterally.
relevant_findings.neurologic: Mental status alert and oriented x 3, able to relate history without difficulty, cranial nerves II-XII intact, normal motor bulk, strength, and tone.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No significant changes noted over time.
